MAC_RLC_MEAS_T Struct Reference
[OpenAirInterface MESH L2/L3 Interfaces]

Detailed Description

MAC/RLC Measurement Information.

Data Fields

char Sinr [NUMBER_OF_MEASUREMENT_SUBBANDS]
 Average SINR (dB) on physical resources corresponding to logical channel.
unsigned char Harq_delay
 Average number of transmission rounds (times 10) on transport channel associated with logical channel.
unsigned short Bler
 Average block error rate (times 1000) on transport channel associated with logical channel.
unsigned char Spec_eff
 Actual Spectral efficiency (bits/symbol times 10) of transport channel associated with logical channel.
unsigned char rlc_sdu_buffer_occ
 RLC SDU buffer occupancy.
unsigned short rlc_sdu_loss_indicator
 RLC SDU Loss indicator.
